content.text: I'm a trauma surgeon. I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing. I'd rather avoid conflict, but I'm ready to defend myself if I need to. My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.

I have border collies for pets, they're my best friends. I love to eat strawberries when I want a sweet treat. I listen to music for more than 5 hours a day. I have gray hair but I still love to read to my grandchildren.
I see you have dogs, that's awesome. I love animals. I'm not sure I'd have the patience for children, though. I'd rather focus on my writing.
Well, I wouldn't have the patience for surgery. I'm not sure how you do it! I'm impressed.
Thanks. It's not easy, but it's rewarding. I'm looking forward to moving to a quieter place so I can focus on my writing.
I can understand that. I'm always looking for peace and quiet. I'm a bit of a loner, I guess.
I'm not a loner, but I do enjoy my own company. I'm looking forward to spending more time in nature, away from the hustle and bustle of city life.
That sounds lovely. I love the outdoors, too. I'm always up for a good hike
